greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Write down squares and cubes in order, as in A002760. The sequence gives the first differences between terms.
comment: Ordered sequence of squares and cubes is as in A002760.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
program: (PARI) lista(nn) = {vec = vector(nn, i, i-1); pp = select(i->(issquare(i) || (ispower(i, 3))), vec); for (i=1, #pp-1, print1(pp[i+1] - pp[i], ", "););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Oct 03 2013
results.author: _Zak Seidov_, Oct 07 2002
